snippet: The International Olympic Committee had suggested that the two nations cooperate to reduce the cost of the Games for South Korea, but South Korea flatly refused.
abstract: South Korea rejects International Olympic Committee's suggestion to share 2018 Pyeongchang Winter Games with Japan in effort to reduce cost.
lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee had suggested that the two nations cooperate to reduce the cost of the Games for South Korea, but South Korea flatly refused.

headline.main: South Korea Won’t Share 2018 Games With Japan
headline.print_headline: South Korea Won’t Share 2018 Games With Japan
